results.title: Metformin Attenuates Monosodium-Iodoacetate-Induced Osteoarthritis via Regulation of Pain Mediators and the Autophagy-Lysosomal Pathway
results.text_hl: These results imply that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can attenuate @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ by inhibiting nociception and @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ severity.

results.title: The Influence of Sildenafil-Metformin Combination on Hyperalgesia and Biochemical Markers in Diabetic Neuropathy in Mice
results.text_hl: Results: In both the hot-plate and tail withdrawal test, all @CHEMICAL_Sildenafil_Citrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068677 @@@sildenafil@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combinations administered in our study showed a significant increase in @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ reaction latencies when compared to the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ control group.

results.title: Metformin in the management of fibrocystic breast disease: a placebo-controlled randomized clinical trial
results.text_hl: In our study, the statistically significant efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ in reducing the size of the larger clusters of microcyst and the @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ score and the absence of significant adverse effects may be in favor of the effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ in the management of @DISEASE_Idiopathic_Pulmonary_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D054990 @@@FCD@@@.

results.text_hl: In addition, 13.89% (n = 5) in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group experienced grade I @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@bone pain@@@ compared to 26.32% (n = 10) in the control group.
